title: Recruiting for Energized Mist[Gold+ Please]
body:
Hi everyone, My name is Ahri and I am the Manager/owner of Energized Fire and Ice, a organization of Ranked 5's teams that competes in tournaments online as well as practice consistently as a team. We are currently having tryouts for Energized Mist. Our team is powered by Marsh.
Now to the important details -

We will be holding individual interviews with each candidate before tryouts begin.
Below are the positions we are currently recruiting:

Jungle - Open

Mid - Open

Top - Open

Support - Open

Adc - Open

Below please fill out this quick application so we can get to know you a bit, and we will add you in game if we would like to proceed.

Current Rank :
Main Role :
Top 4 Champions : (Order Doesn't matter)
Biggest Strength:
Biggest Weakness:
Ability to Shotcall*:

*This answer will not determine eligibility

Please note: Teamspeak, skype, and working microphone are required.

Thank you everyone, and hope to speak with you soon.

When you are done with this application, you can hop on teamspeak for a faster response @ 104.207.141.180:9200 or add me in game

Additional information
You must currently be gold or higher . What rank you were last season does not matter. Your application will be disregarded if you are not gold or higher right now, no acceptations.
You must be 18 years of age.
You must be available every day between 7 pm EST and 11 pm EST.  (No acceptations)

If you do not meet these requirements, please save yourselves and us the time and do not apply. If we find out later on that you do not meet these requirements you will be kicked off the team on the spot with out any discussion.

replies.body:
**Current Rank **
Gold 5, Gold 1 last season 

**Main Role**
Support

**Top 4 Champions**
{{champion:111}} {{champion:16}} {{champion:14}} {{champion:43}} 

**Biggest Strength**
Game knowledge of team synergy/composition

**Biggest Weakness**
slight tunnel vision in big 5v5 chaotic fights

**Ability to Shotcall*
**
Can but never tried via mic. Willing to learn and improve.

I do have a few questions in regards to your "organization" as nothing pops up in google for Energized Fire & Ice. Could you go more into detail as to what you are and what you mean by "powered by Marsh"?  And why have strict necessity on the schedule for _everyday_ from 7 to 11 when we 18+ have obligations such as school, work, and family?

Current Rank : Silver 4(will be getting to gold fast)
Main Role : ADC
Top 4 Champions : Vayne, Twitch, Jhin, Ezreal
Biggest Strength: Communication, Map awarness.
Biggest Weakness: Ability to hard hard carry
Ability to Shotcall*: Yes.  Also not afraid to.
